documentation.author: Steve Wade
documentation.purpose:
The rule BCC_TELEMETRY_ORDER evokes when either the Admit to Inpatient or Place in Observation order has the Room Type selection of either “Telemetry ON for exam” or “Telemetry OFF for exam”. If Room Type “Telemetry ON for exam” is selected The Telemetry order will be placed with the order sentence “Maintain Tele when patient off unit”. If Room Type “Telemetry OFF for exam” is selected the Telemetry order will be placed with the order sentence “Patient may be off Tele for tests”. If either Room Type “Telemetry ON for exam” or “Telemetry OFF for exam” is selected the following orders will be placed unless there are any of these existing orders: Pulse Ox Spot Check, Notify Physician Chest Pain, Physician to Nurse Diagnostic Tests.
11/10/2016 Modify rule "BCC_TELEMETRY_ORDER". The modifications include: • Rule will no longer fire for patients younger than 18 years old • Rule will no longer place nitroGlycerin orders or Oxygen orders • Rule will no longer qualify on Encounter Type (original rule was only for Inpatients and Observation patients) • Rule will not fire for the following five units at SJH: o JH PICU1 o JH PICU2 o JH PCICU o JH SJCHA aka JH E1 o JH SJCHC aka JH E2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS where order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_ACTION_A
templateDefinitions.definition: STOP execution of subsequent action groups.
templateDefinitions.description: Stop execution of subsequent action groups

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_SENTENCE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Set details for orders setup by GROUP_NAME using ORDER_SENTENCE
templateDefinitions.description: Use order sentence to set order detail values

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

leftExpression.alias: Transfer pt within facility Off Tele for tests
Transfer pt within facility ON Tele for tests

value.value: SELECT P.DESCRIPTION FROM PATHWAY P @NEWLINEPLAN P @NEWLINEWHERE P.ENCNTR_ID=@ENCOUNTERID:2 AND@NEWLINEP.PW_STATUS_CD = 996991.00 AND P.PATHWAY_CATALOG_ID = 1335815361.00 and P.STARTED_IND != 1@NEWLINEDETAIL @NEWLINELOG_MISC1 = "FOUND" GO

values.value: Order Sentence for Telemetry -> Patient may be off tele for tests

customValue.value: 288217307\TOnce, for signs of respiratory distress\S113038717\MPulse Ox Spot Check\C113038713\O111965744

values.value: Order Sentence for Pulse Ox Spot Check -> Once, for signs of respiratory distress
